title.value: Эффективность селективного противозлакового гербицида овсюген супер в посевах ярового ячменя
Efficiency of selective anticereal herbicide ovsugen super in spring barley sowings

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Tereshchuk, V.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of researches on herbicide Ovsyugen Super, EC (phenoxaprop-P-ethyl, 140 g/l + kloquintocet-mexyl, 47 g/l /antidote/) action on spring barley (Hordeum vulgare) crops weed infestation by annual grass weed plants including Avena fatua L. the incidence area of which extends every year are stated. The application of the herbicide Ovsyugen Super, EC allows to decrease spring barley crops weed infestation. Data of two year research show that selective herbicide Ovsyugen super EC against cereal weeds can be successfully used in crops of spring barley to control with cereal weeds. Total loss of (100%) of annual monocotyledons weed species was observed at herbicide application rate of 0.6 l / ha and in a reduced rate (0.3 l / ha) mixed with surfactant Sattelit, F (0.2 l / ha ). There was observed no phytotoxic action of the herbicide Ovsyugen super, EC on the studied crop.
